modName: Hybrids Invincible Dwarven Horse Armor for Skyrim
summary: This mod will add horse armor too all horses that uses normal saddles. In addition, it will make armored horses invincible.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
RECOMMEND USING THIS MOD INSTEAD:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13348

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/294935-1328535030.png[/img]
Credit: Designed using mgbeach\'s awesome, hi-res [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4818]Heroic Dwarven Weapons and Armor textures[/url]

[youtube]GH-xRs3gAOw[/youtube]

[size=4]If you like the horse armor, and want to see more, PLEASE ENDORSE (and spread the word). Convince me to continue!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hybrid\'s - Dwarven Armored_Horse 1.0
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version: v1.0
Date: 02/06/2012
Category: New Models and Textures
Author: Gabriel Gullbergh, Hybrid Media

Version -- Change Notes
====================


Description
===========

This mod will add horse armor too all horses that uses normal saddles, including shadowmere. In addition, it will make armored horses invincible. This mod features the dwemer.dwarven style. However feel free to retexture as you like :). Also, please submit your screenshots, especially other horse breeds!

Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move Data folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file if neccesary.
4. IN THE \"DATA\" FOLDER DELETE ANY HORSES (.ESP) THAT YOU DO NOT WANT TO BE INVINCIBLE (any horses you dont own)
5. Launch Skyrim!
**IF YOU ARE USING SHADOWMERE YOU WILL NEED TO MOUNT THE HORSE UPON FIRST LOAD TO ACTIVATE THE ARMOR PERMANENTLY**

Recommended Other Mods:
=========================

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3611&navtag=file/images.php?id=3611&tab=3]Revised Horses (Horse Inventory, Horse Summon & More)[/url]


Contact
=======
Please PM me via my username at this site.

Tools Used
==========
Photoshop CS5
3Ds Max
Nifscope
Nvidia Photoshop tools

Licensing/Legal
===============
I highly encourage re-textures! However, please do not upload or host the mesh without my permission. 


	[/size]	[/center]
